participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, enjoys imaginative activities and has a passion for storytelling.
participant_1.background: My parents would take my brother and I when we were little. I used to wear a cape. I love going to the movies. It's one of my favorite hobbies. We liked to pretend we were superheroes.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, loves exploring different interests and has a strong appreciation for music and sci-fi.
participant_2.background: I work for the railroad. My favorite band is VNV Nation. I am an omnivore. I really like watching Star Trek.

content.text: Hi, my name is (user 1's name).
Hi, my name is (user 2's name).
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Star Trek, listen to vnv nation, and work on the railroad.
That's cool! I like going to the movies, reading, and playing video games.
I used to love going to the movies when I was a kid. I would pretend I was a superhero with my brother.
That's awesome! I used to do the same thing.
What's your favorite movie?
I like a lot of different movies, but my favorite is probably The Dark Knight.
That's a great movie! I love the Joker.
Me too! He's such a great villain.
So what do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but my favorite genre is fantasy.
I love fantasy too! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is probably Harry Potter.
That's a great book! I love the Harry Potter series.
Me too! I've read them all multiple times.
So what do you like to play video games?
I like to play a lot of different video games, but my favorite genre is probably action-adventure.
I love action-adventure games too! What's your favorite game?
My favorite game is probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I love the open world.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, it does! I'm glad we met.
Me too!
